DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effectiveness combination diclofenac lidocaine gel reduce pain IUD insertion .
DOC.brief_title: Diclofenac Plus Lidocaine Gel Pain Relief During Intrauterine Device Insertion ( IUD ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Various study evaluate use local anesthetic misoprostol prior IUD insertion mix results.We think combination diclofenac lidocaine gel could successful relieve pain IUD insertion single therapy.The aim study determine effectiveness combination diclofenac lidocaine gel reduce pain IUD insertion .
DOC.criteria: Patients reproductive age request IUD contraception Patients contraindication IUD insertion ( le 6 week postpartum , less 2 week abortion , uterine anomaly , fibroid distort uterine cavity , pregnancy , pelvic inflammatory disease , cervicitis , uterine depth le 6 cm 9 cm ) , previous IUD insertion , allergy diclofenac lidocaine , peptic ulcer , asthma , bleed disorder , cardiac , liver kidney disease .
